name: Spirit of the Wind
description:
Spirit of the Wind is a Studio Ghibli inspired adventure platformer.

Follow Fujin, a young Wind Watcher, as he seeks his lost brother, Raijin,  across the lands to warn him of an oncoming catastrophe.

Currently build is what will eventually be the full demo of the game. Complete Act 1.

Still to be added:
Reworking some of the background work
Finishing details (like cheering,  fonts, crowds and flags etc.)
Boss fight soundtrack
Theme music
Intro menu/splash page etc.

All the artwork and programming are mine.
Update = have engaged a music composer for the game.

Have a small, consistent group of playtesters (friends and family) helping me develop this game. Would love to have feedback from a larger community to improve and iterate the quality of this game further. 

Thank you for being part of the journey.
